subject: Ghost Box Store
author: Urkel23
full_text:
After listening to my friend Rich's suggestion, i decided to make available some of my
boxes for sale on my site. I will probably be offering several hacks and test
pieces as i progress with my work. I have so many boxes now, i need to get rid
of some.

I know the price may be steep, but i'm considering the tech support i have to
offer and possibly having to fix them over and over again. I figured i would
show you guys. I'm not in this to make money, but just enough to fund
some new projects. It all goes back into the research.

http://www.stevehultay.com/ghostboxstore.html

-Steve H.
